The Right Stuff Vol. IV No. 24, San Francisco No. 22, 6/17/1986
The Right Stuff Vol. IV No. 24, San Francisco No. 22, 6/17/1986

The Right Stuff, San Francisco1.This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL:San Francisco AIDS Foundation2.Introduction by The Right Stuff hosts, Doris Fish and Tippi3.David Alex Nahmod and the Movies, Discussion about "Invaders from Mars," "Man in the Silk Hat," "Parents Come Out, and "The AIDS Show" from Theatre Rinocerous4.Ask Dr. Farkle, Discussion about Lynn Redgrave and Rita Mae Brown5.Phillip R. Ford interviews Cher impersonator and talks about upcoming events6.Footage of Blazing Redheads concert7.Closing Credits
Program content: Margaret Gomez and Flaming Red Heads
